name: ROOT:schoolDiary
description: ROOT:schoolDiary

name: Calendar
description: A Calendar task that manages a schedule and events. It helps track important dates, appointments, and deadlines.

name: April Recess
description: Take a break from school work during April.

name: Return the task from May
description: Return the task from May: 26th Is a holiday so no school there may be a name and a schedule component, also explain why

name: 13th Minimum day Last day of school
description: The 13th Minimum day marks the last full day of school, with subsequent days as holidays. Teacher work days are interspersed throughout these days.

name: 4th Holiday
description: A special occasion that occurs every 4 years, typically on January 4th. This task involves planning and organizing a small celebration with family and friends.

name: August Teacher Days
description: Teacher's Day is a day dedicated to teachers, celebrated in many countries around the world on various dates. In our institution, it falls on 19th-21st August.

name: Labor Day
description: To take a day off work to honor the holiday.

name: Holidays
description: Return tasks for November including 1st, 11th, 25th-29th Holidays.

name: Holidays Task
description: Return the task from December 23rd to 31st. This task may involve both a name and schedule component, explaining why it is necessary.

name: Monday Homework Assignment
description: Complete your Monday homework assignment including reading and writing tasks. Ensure that all components are included as per schedule.

name: Homework Review
description: Every night, I need to review my reading homework by setting aside time each evening to go through the book and highlight key points. This helps reinforce what Iâ€™ve learned during class and prepares me for upcoming lessons.

name: Extra Spelling and Math practice
description: Every two days, students are required to complete an extra spelling and math practice session. This involves practicing their spelling skills by creating a list of words from a given list or generating sentences using the words, as well as solving math problems focusing on basic arithmetic operations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.

name: Clothes washed
description: It's essential to maintain a balanced diet by washing clothes regularly to prevent pilling and odors. This task ensures that all items are cleaned in time.

name: Field Trips
description: Plan and organize field trips for students, ensuring educational value while keeping them engaged.

name: Organize Driving School Docs
description: Organize driving school documentation to ensure all necessary materials are readily available for a smooth drive.

name: Cabaret Rehearsal
description: Organizing and performing in a cabaret setting, including song selection, stage setup, and audience interaction.

name: Snack and Lunch Preparation
description: Prepare snacks and lunch, ensuring a healthy and balanced meal plan.

name: Monday Morning Mind Quiz
description: A weekly quiz aimed at starting the workday with a quick, engaging mental challenge. It can be incorporated into the daily routine either as an icebreaker or a brain teaser to kickstart productivity and focus.

name: Birthday Party
description: A birthday party is an event where someone celebrates their birthday with friends, family, and well-wishes. It can include games, food, gifts, and decorations.

name: Bike to School
description: Go to school on Wednesday mornings by bike. The task involves bringing a name tag and uniform. It also has a schedule component, ensuring that the task happens consistently every week at the same time.

name: School Start Preparation
description: Needs to leave house at 7:45am and school starts at 8:15am.

name: School Pickup
description: Return the task from School pickup on Mon, Tue, Thur, Fri at 2:35pm. On Wednesday it's early pickup at 1:45pm with a name and schedule component.

name: Reviewing Schedule
description: The task involves reviewing a schedule to ensure all events are coordinated and on time.

name: Lunch Break
description: A scheduled break period where individuals can take a 20-minute lunch and engage in other work or personal activities.

name: Recess
description: Take a short break from work to relax and recharge.

name: Contact Information
description: Retrieving contact information from Tamalpais Valley School website includes phone number, email address, and physical address. This task may also involve additional components such as the name of the person and schedule.

name: Update school schedule
description: Needs to be updated regularly in case there's no school.
